$WmMPID_ゼルギウス,ch11_03_Zelgius_M_Normal,Face|I am the imperial general, Zelgius.
Warriors from another world...you
appear strong. That is good.$k$pI will accept your challenge.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|We're almost there.$k$pPast this mountain lies the gate I
used to travel here from Nifl.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Is that flame?!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The town is ablaze! Is that...Múspell's
army?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Let's move!$k$p$Sbs150|
